block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an Origami Snail. This origami snail designed by Kunihiko Kasahara looks amazing and it is simple at the same time. Try it out yourself. Learn it in less than a minute! Enjoy!!! Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
